snippet.title: 20 Bunnies Trailer (PS4/PS5)
snippet.description:
Enter a world of simple pleasures and minimalistic design, where your only goal is to navigate cleverly arranged stages, avoid spikes and locate beautiful rabbit-eared companions hidden in the environment. But beware of hazards! Lose three hearts, and you’ll instantly respawn at the beginning, with your bunny counter reset to zero. You’ll need to find them all without dying in order to proceed to the next stage and unlock an adorable image for each one you complete.

Platforms in the foreground are silhouetted against lush hand-drawn backdrops. Clouds pass by overhead, trees sway in the breeze and historical architecture dots the landscape as mellow tunes accompany you on a chill quest of fluffy companionship. Your best times are tracked with each playthrough, inviting you to come back and top your own record.

© Eastasiasoft Limited, Nerd Games. All Rights Reserved.
